channel.title: Nu Era Fitness Products
channel.description: Products from the Nu Era Fitness online store

item.title: Gray Series V2 Kettlebell 4kg (8.8lb)
item.description: Gray Series Version 2 Kettlebells are a quality kettlebell at an incredible price. The new Gray Series Kettlebells are single cast and have a wider smooth thick 1.5-inch diameter handle for ideal use and comfort. A great design with a gray hammertone finish and a removable black rubber boot on the bottom of each kettlebell to protect flooring.  Kettlebells are a key piece of equipment for any CrossFit enthusiast.  Unlike your standard dumbbells, the center of mass of a kettlebells is beyond where the hand grips the weight.  Kettlebells allow for swinging movements, which are not possible with traditional dumbbells, involving more muscle groups and is said to be more effective and yield better results.  Perfect for bulk ordering customers and those who want a great kettlebell at a low price.
item.product_type: Sporting Goods > Exercise & Fitness > Free Weights > Kettlebells

item.title: 12" Steel Plyo Box
item.description: USA Plyometric Boxes offers the most stability and durability with 1 inch square tubular steel construction and fully welded frames. Athletes on any level can use these boxes for forward, lateral, and other plyometric jumping drills. Use taller boxes in combination with shorter boxes for a variety of drills such as, high jumps with step downs, and progressive height jumping. Available in multiple heights, from 6" to 42". Tops are reinforced 1/2" plywood with nonslip rubber surface. Stackable for easy storage.
item.product_type: Sporting Goods > Exercise & Fitness > Plyo Boxes

item.title: Rage Medicine Ball 6lb
item.description:
Nu Era Rage Balls are the highest quality medicine balls on the market for the most economical price. Each weight is the same size, 45" in circumference. Allowing the athlete to increase the weight without changing their movement. Our med balls have a more "solid" feel compared to other balls on the market.

The ability to generate strength and power is a very important component for success in many sports, particularly in those involving explosive movements. Medicine ball training, in conjunction with a program of weight training and circuit training, can be used to develop strength and power. Certain medicine ball exercises can also be used as part of a plyometric training program to develop explosive movements. Medicine ball training is appropriate to all levels of ability, age, development and sport. To be most effective the program should contain exercises that match the pattern of movements of the sport.

- Made in the USA
- 2 year full guarantee
- If this product does not meet or exceed your expectations we will take it back and issue a full refund, including all    shipping costs.
item.product_type: Sporting Goods > Exercise & Fitness > Medicine Balls

item.title: Slammer Ball 10lb
item.description:
THE SLAMMER!
Every aspect of The Slammer was designed around a single movement, The Slam Ball. The shell, weight medium, air pressure, and dimensions are the result of extensive product development performed over a range of environments. We believe we have created something unique that will eliminate the frustrations of current commercial products while providing years of physical pain and suffering to its users. 

Just say no to Corks! We didn’t cut the cork, stuff the cork, or glue the cork. We eliminated the cork. Many current products used for the slam ball movement make use of a plastic rim and cork system. Slamming a ball repeatedly at the wrong angle will cause the product to fail at or near the rim. By working closely with material specialists we were able to create both a product and process that allows for the same super tough 9” diameter shell to be weighted at 10, 15, 20, 25, or 30 pounds and 10" diameter for the 35, 40, and 50 pounds without the use of a cork system. 

Tested tough. This ball has undergone an incredible gauntlet of testing. We did our best to run this ball through the unknown and the unknowable but it still came back for more slams. In fact several of our prototypes have been slammed over 5000 times and are still on active duty. That’s why we are confident in making the below UNCONDITONAL GUARANTEE; 

If your Slammer has a failure for any reason for three years simply send us the shell and we will replace the ball no questions asked. 

Oh yeah we almost forgot, its 20 – 30% cheaper and than any other non bounce med ball on the market.
item.product_type: Sporting Goods > Exercise & Fitness > Medicine Balls > Slammer Balls

Oh yeah we almost forgot, its 20 – 30% cheaper and than any other non bounce med ball on the market.

item.title: Slammer Ball 25lb
item.description:
THE SLAMMER!
Every aspect of The Slammer was designed around a single movement, The Slam Ball. The shell, weight medium, air pressure, and dimensions are the result of extensive product development performed over a range of environments. We believe we have created something unique that will eliminate the frustrations of current commercial products while providing years of physical pain and suffering to its users. 

Just say no to Corks! We didn’t cut the cork, stuff the cork, or glue the cork. We eliminated the cork. Many current products used for the slam ball movement make use of a plastic rim and cork system. Slamming a ball repeatedly at the wrong angle will cause the product to fail at or near the rim. By working closely with material specialists we were able to create both a product and process that allows for the same super tough 9” diameter shell to be weighted at 10, 15, 20, 25, or 30 pounds and 10" diameter for the 35, 40, and 50 pounds without the use of a cork system. 

Tested tough. This ball has undergone an incredible gauntlet of testing. We did our best to run this ball through the unknown and the unknowable but it still came back for more slams. In fact several of our prototypes have been slammed over 5000 times and are still on active duty. That’s why we are confident in making the below UNCONDITONAL GUARANTEE; 

If your Slammer has a failure for any reason for three years simply send us the shell and we will replace the ball no questions asked. 

Oh yeah we almost forgot, its 20 – 30% cheaper and than any other non bounce med ball on the market.

item.title: Stud Pull Up Bar
item.description:
If you are serious about pull ups, chin ups, or kipping pull ups, you need a sturdy fixed-mount pull up bar.  The Stud Bar is a gym-quality pull up bar made from welded 14 gauge steel with gussets for added strength.  Stud Bar is designed to mount on 8’ to 10’ ceilings, or any wall, and is adjustable from 14” to 22” away from the ceiling or wall, and its mounting holes center on your ceiling or wall studs at 48 inches, (Grade 8 mounting hardware included).  Stud Bar’s 48” width allows for wide grip pull up and can support up to 600 lbs.

The bar is 1 ¼” diameter for a comfortable grip.

Hammer tone powder coated finish.

Wood mounting hardware included.

item.description:
Strong abs go hand-in-hand with a strong back. Get total trunk protection with the ultimate core trainer, the AbMat! 

-The AbMat is a totally one-of-a-kind abdominal exerciser and core trainer because it offers: 

-The full range of motion necessary to work the entire abdominal muscle group. Crunch exercises and most equipment fall short of the AbMat.

A variety of exercises that isolate upper and/or lower abs, as well as the obliques and lower back muscles. 

A safe, comfortable design contoured to your lower back to provide support and to help prevent injury.

One size fits all! There is no need to worry about height and weight differences between users.

A compact, portable design that requires no set-up or tear-down. Take it with you anywhere!

item.title: Clock Gone Bad
item.description:
The Clock Gone Bad frame is 8.5” high and 21” wide with 5” high numbers that can be seen from a hundred meters out. The timer has a remote control that gives the user the ability to start Fight Gone Bad or a 20/10 TABATA by hitting one button. One ping to begin work two pings to begin rest. The timer has a 10 second countdown for every workout to give the users time to prepare. The timer pings four times at the end of the countdown for 3-2-1-GO! The timer can be programmed to count up to or down from a set time. Timer has holes that are 16 inches apart to hang on wall studs. Remote control range is 40 meters. Acts as a clock when not used. Batteries included. Timer weighs 5lbs. 

So drop the stop watch and put up a timer that everyone in your box or garage can see at a glance.

item.title: Olympic Weightlifting - A Complete Guide for Athletes & Coaches - 2nd Ed.
item.description:
Olympic Weightlifting: A Complete Guide for Athletes & Coaches (2nd Edition) A comprehensive guide to learning and instructing the Olympic and related lifts. Includes sections on learning progressions, lift analyses, error correction, competition, programming, sample training programs, flexibility, warm-up protocols, and nutrition. 

Over 100 new pages have been added in this edition, with greatly expanded sections on programming, learning progressions and lift analyses. 

8.5" x 11" / 423 pages 

"Simply the best book available on Olympic weightlifting."
-Don Weideman, Vice President - Pacific Weightlifting Association 

"Without a doubt the best book on the market today about Olympic-style weightlifting. If I were teaching a college class, this would be the book I would have all my students buy." 
-Mike Burgener, USA Weightlifting senior international coach 

"I have purchased dozens of books over the past fifteen years on topics ranging from martial arts to elements of gymnastics and weightlifting. Most contain some useful information; however, few make the yearly cut when I weed through my bookshelf to make room for new material. Why? I can't look back at these books, year after year and find something new every time I open the page. This is not the case with Olympic Weightlifting: A Complete Guide for Athletes & Coaches. Everett’s book is unique in that it is concise, yet thorough. Anyone from a raw beginner to the elite level competitor will find something new in this book every time they open its pages. Everett’s strengths are his attention to detail and intelligent, accessible progressions. You will love this book, and it will never end up at the used bookstore." 
-Robb Wolf, NorCal Strength & Conditioning 

"This is the book I would recommend to anyone wanting to begin the sport of Weightlifting. Greg took material that has been discussed for decades by many many great coaches and authors and managed to present it with a clarity that has rarely, if ever, been achieved. I don’t care how many years you have coached, or how many lifters you have coached, no one is going to read this book without coming across a few passages that make a light-bulb go off in his head. Greg has a way of taking material that has been argued and discussed to death, and presenting it in such a clear way that it makes you wonder why anything else ever had to be written or said." 
-Glenn Pendlay 

"When I picked up the book, Olympic Weightlifting: A Complete Guide for Athletes and Coaches, my first thought was: "this is heavy... heavier than what most guys train with on a typical day. "Complete" is an understatement. This book, along with Tommy Kono's opus, might finally encourage the masses to consider Olympic lifting as a basic part of correct training. 

It is also a nice surprise to find the supplement and foam rolling section. Generally, recovery is ignored in many texts but we find ample discussion here in Greg's book. Moreover, I felt the sample programs were realistic and suggestive not oppressive. It's nice to find a book that emphasizes the movements over the system. I highly recommend the book. 
-Dan John 

"I was extremely impressed and pleased by this book… The book presents a logical method of learning the lifts (inasmuch as they can be learned from a book without hands-on coaching) and the information is solid and thorough. Anybody looking for an excellent examination of competitive Olympic lifting would do worse than to have this on their shelf." 
-Lyle McDonald 

"My expectations were very high but still wildly surpassed. The only downside is that this book has made the bulk of my training library obsolete." 
-Rob McBee, CrossFit Camas 

"Excellent book and should be required reading for all CrossFitters!" 
-Steve Rakow, CrossFit Ocean City

item.title: Sandbag Trainer - Outer Shell Only
item.description:
Sandbag Training Systems
The MDUSA Sandbag System can be filled with combinations of sand “Filler” bags or with any combination of three "Slammer" medicine balls. Max weight is 80lbs (two large filler bags filled with sand) or 3 x 30lb Slammer Balls.

Due to their versatility, simplicity, and proven results Sandbags are fast becoming one of the most popular functional fitness tools out there. Sandbag training helps develop explosive power and strength in the lower, core, and upper body efficiently due to the instability of the load. MDUSA Sandbag systems can be used to create a multitude of functional workouts that includes movements such as cleans, overhead presses, weighted lunges or squats, and rotational pulls. The ability to move a “dead” weight from the ground to overhead or from point “A” to point “B is foundational for many sports and an essential movement in life.

NuEra's Sandbags are made of high-density rugged materials. The “systems” approach allows for loads of versatility and ease of use.

Sandbag Outer Shell – 26in length x 9 in diameter

Consider getting a filler bag to give yourself options to vary the weight inside the Sandbag Trainer outer shell.

Large Filler Bag – 30in length x 9in width
Medium Filler Bag – 22in length x 8in width
Small Filler Bag – 17in length x 4.5in width

item.title: EVA Round Foam Roller - 36" x 6"
item.description:
Our EVA high density premium foam will hold its shape through constant use. Eva foam is manufactured in a way that prohibits wicking making it easy to clean and give the foam anti microbial properties. Great for stretching, soft tissue work, and balance training.

NuEra highly recommends using a foam roller to stretch prior to working out when sore and to work out lactic acid during and after workouts.  Foam Rolling is a Self-Myofascial release technique used by athletes and physical therapists to inhibit overactive muscles. This form of stretching utilizes the concept of autogenic inhibition to improve soft tissue extensibility.  This relaxes the muscle and allows the activation of the antagonist muscle.  Foam Rolling is accomplished by rolling the foam roller under each muscle group until a tender area is found, and maintaining pressure on the tender area for 30-60 seconds.

item.description: Resistance tubing is an extremely affordable training tool that can provide an effective workout and muscle stimulation for recovery for virtually anyone. Different from standardized equipment, resistance tubing allows you to exercise in multiple angles. With varying resistance levels, you can have anywhere from an intense workout to just a streaching and warm-up routine, while completing a full range of motion on each exercise. Being the most easily portable type of training equipment, you can add resistance to many CrossFit exercises when heavier equipment is not available.

item.title: Slammer Ball 35lb
item.description:
THE SLAMMER!
Every aspect of The Slammer was designed around a single movement, The Slam Ball. The shell, weight medium, air pressure, and dimensions are the result of extensive product development performed over a range of environments. We believe we have created something unique that will eliminate the frustrations of current commercial products while providing years of physical pain and suffering to its users. 

Just say no to Corks! We didn’t cut the cork, stuff the cork, or glue the cork. We eliminated the cork. Many current products used for the slam ball movement make use of a plastic rim and cork system. Slamming a ball repeatedly at the wrong angle will cause the product to fail at or near the rim. By working closely with material specialists we were able to create both a product and process that allows for the same super tough 9” diameter shell to be weighted at 10, 15, 20, 25, or 30 pounds and 10" diameter for the 35, 40, and 50 pounds without the use of a cork system. 

Tested tough. This ball has undergone an incredible gauntlet of testing. We did our best to run this ball through the unknown and the unknowable but it still came back for more slams. In fact several of our prototypes have been slammed over 5000 times and are still on active duty. That’s why we are confident in making the below UNCONDITONAL GUARANTEE; 

If your Slammer has a failure for any reason for three years simply send us the shell and we will replace the ball no questions asked. 

Oh yeah we almost forgot, its 20 – 30% cheaper and than any other non bounce med ball on the market.
item.product_type: Sporting Goods > Exercise & Fitness > Medicine Balls > Slammer Balls

item.title: Rage Medicine Ball 12lb
item.description:
NuEra Rage Balls are the highest quality medicine balls on the market for the most economical price. Each weight is the same size, 45" in circumference. Allowing the athlete to increase the weight without changing their movement. Our med balls have a more "solid" feel compared to other balls on the market.

The ability to generate strength and power is a very important component for success in many sports, particularly in those involving explosive movements. Medicine ball training, in conjunction with a program of weight training and circuit training, can be used to develop strength and power. Certain medicine ball exercises can also be used as part of a plyometric training program to develop explosive movements. Medicine ball training is appropriate to all levels of ability, age, development and sport. To be most effective the program should contain exercises that match the pattern of movements of the sport.

- Made in the USA
- 2 year full guarantee
- If this product does not meet or exceed your expectations we will take it back and issue a full refund, including all    shipping costs.

MDUSA Strength Bands
Strength Bands are an incredible versatile tool for adding resistance to stretching, lifting, and bodyweight training exercises. A higher quality band does not exist. Six different widths provide a range of resistance levels.

Primarily used for adding weight to power lifts. Resistance is 70 to 175 pounds.

item.description:
MDUSA Strength Bands
Strength Bands are an incredible versatile tool for adding resistance to stretching, lifting, and bodyweight training exercises. A higher quality band does not exist. Red – XX-Light – ½” Wide
Primarily used for adding resistance to stretching exercises. Resistance is 5 – 35 pounds. 

Purple – X-Light – 1 1/8” wide
Good choice as a general use band and a specifically for adding resistance to people under 140 pounds during walks, high knees, or sprints. Resistance is 25 - 80 pounds. 

Green – Light – 1 ¾” wide
This band is also a good size for general use and for adding resistance to people from 140 to 200 pounds for body movements. Good choice for pull up training. Resistance is 50 – 120 pounds.

Blue – Medium – 2 ½” wide
For use getting started on training for bodyweight pull ups and adding resistance for elite athletes and people over 200 pounds. Also a good choice for adding increment weight to power lifts. Resistance 60 – 150 pounds.

item.title: Modular Unit Add-Ons
item.description:
These Modular Unit Add-Ons offer a great way to supplement your racks with the additional stations you need!  

- The adjustable dip bars provide a solid space saving option for bar dips. Slide a band over the ends to modify for any strength level

- The safety sliders provide a very safe "mechanical spotter" for your squat and bench press. Also a great tool for Rack Pulls and Clean Pulls as well as many other uses

- The 4ft muscle-up station can be added on to any existing 6ft section of rack, and allow for "dead hang" muscle-ups to be performed. They simply bolt on and are supported by guy chains (all included)
